channel.title: Quality Irrelevant
channel.description: Quality Irrelevant is an infrequent and unfunny show where Theo forces his friend and hostage, Phil, to record a podcast. What could go wrong?
channel.itunes:subtitle: Quality Irrelevant is an infrequent and unfunny show where Theo forces his friend and hostage, Phil, to record a podcast. What could go wrong?
channel.itunes:author: Quality Irrelevant

item.title: #15: Ron Perlman Is In Half Though
item.itunes:author: Quality Irrelevant
item.itunes:summary: It’s war! Quality Irrelevant is now the official Ministry of War Correspondence. The duo come up with a cross-media marketing scheme to recruit a child army for the war effort, and nobody gets prosecuted for war crimes.
item.itunes:subtitle: It’s war! Quality Irrelevant is now the official
item.description: It’s war! Quality Irrelevant is now the official Ministry of War Correspondence. The duo come up with a cross-media marketing scheme to recruit a child army for the war effort, and nobody gets prosecuted for war crimes.

item.title: #14: Blocking Mulan
item.itunes:author: Quality Irrelevant
item.itunes:summary: The Quality Irrelevant boys spend far too long analyzing their own dynamic. Phil pitches another brilliant film for brilliant Patrick Fabian and Theo ponders who truly are the Gregory the House amongst us. No Homers.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Quality Irrelevant boys spend far too long an…
item.description: The Quality Irrelevant boys spend far too long analyzing their own dynamic. Phil pitches another brilliant film for brilliant Patrick Fabian and Theo ponders who truly are the Gregory the House amongst us. No Homers.

item.title: #13: “I Will Telekinetic You!” says Captain America
item.itunes:author: Quality Irrelevant
item.itunes:summary: Say no to getting hit by a car! Phil gets brain surgery, Theo causes a building to collapse on the smallfolk, and the Frooiti Boyz terrorise the local schools with 90s nostalgic horseshit.
item.itunes:subtitle: Say no to getting hit by a car! Phil gets brain s…
item.description: Say no to getting hit by a car! Phil gets brain surgery, Theo causes a building to collapse on the smallfolk, and the Frooiti Boyz terrorise the local schools with 90s nostalgic horseshit.

item.title: #12: Also Urine
item.itunes:author: Quality Irrelevant
item.itunes:summary: Theo samples the souls of the innocent and a policeman's leg, Phil discovers that Jaffa cakes are definitely fruit and, in a misguided attempt to lampoon that one awful movie with the magicians that we just can't stop talking about, the duo pitch the same fucking film twice. Also urine.
item.itunes:subtitle: Theo samples the souls of the innocent and a poli…
item.description: Theo samples the souls of the innocent and a policeman's leg, Phil discovers that Jaffa cakes are definitely fruit and, in a misguided attempt to lampoon that one awful movie with the magicians that we just can't stop talking about, the duo pitch the same fucking film twice. Also urine.

item.title: #11: Inside the Drywall with Dr Theo
item.itunes:author: Quality Irrelevant
item.itunes:summary: Quality Irrelevant gets scientific! Experiment with us as Theo combines cheese and water, Phil drives Theo to insanity by revealing the plot of the godawful film, ‘Now You See Me’, and the duo expose the dark science Pedo-Terminators. Also turtles, Sam Neill, and it’s all fine.
item.itunes:subtitle: Quality Irrelevant gets scientific! Experiment wi…
item.description: Quality Irrelevant gets scientific! Experiment with us as Theo combines cheese and water, Phil drives Theo to insanity by revealing the plot of the godawful film, ‘Now You See Me’, and the duo expose the dark science Pedo-Terminators. Also turtles, Sam Neill, and it’s all fine.

item.title: #10: Below Average Not Murdering People Skills
item.itunes:author: Quality Irrelevant
item.itunes:summary: This week, all shall perish! Join Quality Irrelevant for another week of perfectly segued flowing horseshit. Theo comes to the conclusion that Zool is not relatable, Phil calls out Wild Wild West for being terrible, and the pair soldier through another film pitch for Patrick Fabian.
item.itunes:subtitle: This week, all shall perish! Join Quality Irrelev…
item.description: This week, all shall perish! Join Quality Irrelevant for another week of perfectly segued flowing horseshit. Theo comes to the conclusion that Zool is not relatable, Phil calls out Wild Wild West for being terrible, and the pair soldier through another film pitch for Patrick Fabian.

item.title: #9: Ethan Hawke is Made of Wallpaper
item.itunes:author: Quality Irrelevant
item.itunes:summary: Quality Irrelevant reveals itself as the Appleman of podcasts. Theo celebrates Easter the traditional way, Phil lays out a five year plan for Patrick Fabian, and the pair discuss their plans for the upcoming Purge.
item.itunes:subtitle: Quality Irrelevant reveals itself as the Appleman…
item.description: Quality Irrelevant reveals itself as the Appleman of podcasts. Theo celebrates Easter the traditional way, Phil lays out a five year plan for Patrick Fabian, and the pair discuss their plans for the upcoming Purge.

item.title: #8: “Chug Down My Meat Drink” says The Living Salad
item.itunes:author: Quality Irrelevant
item.itunes:summary: It is the Beetleborgs special of Quality Irrelevant, and more obscene than ever! Phil continues his crusade to make Patrick Fabian infamous, and Theo trademarks his own brand of sneezes. The pair realise they are connected in more ways than one amidst nipple drama.
item.itunes:subtitle: It is the Beetleborgs special of Quality Irreleva…
item.description: It is the Beetleborgs special of Quality Irrelevant, and more obscene than ever! Phil continues his crusade to make Patrick Fabian infamous, and Theo trademarks his own brand of sneezes. The pair realise they are connected in more ways than one amidst nipple drama.

item.title: #7: C.H.U.D. as a Foreign Language
item.itunes:author: Quality Irrelevant
item.itunes:summary: Things are looking up, Phil is captured by possibly robots while Theo gets invited to dinner with the C.H.U.D.s. In this episode Quality Irrelevant makes Patrick Fabian infamous, expels magicians from society, and draws the line at threatening the assassination of famous babies.
item.itunes:subtitle: Things are looking up, Phil is captured by possib…
item.description: Things are looking up, Phil is captured by possibly robots while Theo gets invited to dinner with the C.H.U.D.s. In this episode Quality Irrelevant makes Patrick Fabian infamous, expels magicians from society, and draws the line at threatening the assassination of famous babies.

item.title: #6: Hurling an Ice Cream off a Bridge
item.itunes:author: Quality Irrelevant
item.itunes:summary: Quality Irrelevant becomes the 1%, then performs a heel-face turn to represent the downtrodden and rage against the man. Theo has too many ideas, while Phil is insolent and becomes a wendigo.
item.itunes:subtitle: Quality Irrelevant becomes the 1%, then performs …
item.description: Quality Irrelevant becomes the 1%, then performs a heel-face turn to represent the downtrodden and rage against the man. Theo has too many ideas, while Phil is insolent and becomes a wendigo.

item.title: #5: The Man Who Killed His Own Brain
item.itunes:author: Quality Irrelevant
item.itunes:summary: There is no theme this week. Theo sits upon a throne of dead spiders while Phil becomes Mayor and saves the world from itself. The pair harass the public via mail and compare pre-dream journals. Quality not guaranteed.
item.itunes:subtitle: There is no theme this week. Theo sits upon a thr…
item.description: There is no theme this week. Theo sits upon a throne of dead spiders while Phil becomes Mayor and saves the world from itself. The pair harass the public via mail and compare pre-dream journals. Quality not guaranteed.

item.title: #4: A Contraption That Stabs You a Million Times
item.itunes:author: Quality Irrelevant
item.itunes:summary: Finally the podcast gets political, solves all crime, and continues to be more mainstream than the mainstream. The world remembers Phil as both man and monster, Theo dreams big while eating jelly, and the duo create the best art.
item.itunes:subtitle: Finally the podcast gets political, solves all cr…
item.description: Finally the podcast gets political, solves all crime, and continues to be more mainstream than the mainstream. The world remembers Phil as both man and monster, Theo dreams big while eating jelly, and the duo create the best art.

item.title: #3: A Ball of Human Fingers
item.itunes:author: Quality Irrelevant
item.itunes:summary: Quality Irrelevant sells out. While desperately trying to establish a marketing strategy for the podcast, Phil teaches Theo about space and Theo decides to go full mainstream. The duo also delve into what makes them scared (mostly paranoid gibberish).
item.itunes:subtitle: Quality Irrelevant sells out. While desperately t…
item.description: Quality Irrelevant sells out. While desperately trying to establish a marketing strategy for the podcast, Phil teaches Theo about space and Theo decides to go full mainstream. The duo also delve into what makes them scared (mostly paranoid gibberish).

item.title: #2: Radioactive Kobe Hamster Meat
item.itunes:author: Quality Irrelevant
item.itunes:summary: It is the most saddest day. Phil plans to eat his only friend left in the world, Theo believes a time capsule is the final solution, and they both unveil a deciduous conspiracy.
item.itunes:subtitle: It is the most saddest day. Phil plans to eat his…
item.description: It is the most saddest day. Phil plans to eat his only friend left in the world, Theo believes a time capsule is the final solution, and they both unveil a deciduous conspiracy.

item.title: #1: Blood Slippers in Bed
item.itunes:author: Quality Irrelevant
item.itunes:summary: Theo and Phil staunchly refuse to introduce themselves or welcome anyone to the new podcast. Theo attempts to maintain order and Phil experiences a haemorrhage.
item.itunes:subtitle: Theo and Phil staunchly refuse to introduce thems…
item.description: Theo and Phil staunchly refuse to introduce themselves or welcome anyone to the new podcast. Theo attempts to maintain order and Phil experiences a haemorrhage.
